dict.acceptation: 年（ year的名词复数 ）；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生；

sent.orig: An old Chinese saying goes, "It takes ten years to grow trees but a hundred years to rear people".
sent.trans: 中国有句古话：“十年树木，百年树人。”

sent.orig: If he was given five years' imprisonment, he could be let out after three years.
sent.trans: 要是他被判五年徒刑，他就可能在三年后出狱。

sent.orig: If the birds have not flown for three years, they will soar into the clouds. If they have not sung for three years, their songs will take everyone by surprise.
sent.trans: 三年不蜚，蜚将冲天；三年不鸣，鸣将惊人。

sent.orig: If the illegal gains are very large the counterfeiter shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than three years and not more than seven years and be fined.
sent.trans: 对于违法所得数额巨大的，处3年以上7年以下有期徒刑，并处罚金。

sent.orig: It takes ten years to grow trees, but a hundred years to rear people.
